name: Nodes Escape
description:
Game Name


Nodes Escape

Game Description


This is a word puzzle game full of wisdom and challenges that will immerse you in the mysterious world of secret rooms and challenge your logical thinking and vocabulary knowledge. In the game, you will be faced with a tricky puzzle to find the hidden clues and solve the puzzle so as to open the door to freedom.

Key Features


  • Rich level design: the game contains several levels, each with a unique theme and tight puzzles waiting for players to challenge.
  • Unique word puzzle: Combining the features of word games, puzzle games and room escape games, it provides a unique gaming experience.
  • Intellectual Challenge: The puzzles in the game are designed to test your logical reasoning, observation and knowledge base, allowing you to exercise your brain in an entertaining way.
  • Achievement System: Unlock a variety of achievements to show off your achievements and strengths in the game!

Gameplay


1. After entering the game, it is best to go through the Beginner's guide to get familiar with the basic operation
2. It is recommended to play the level mode first, from simple to difficult. You can click to see the hints if you can't solve the puzzle
3. more node features, more fun level design, waiting for you to explore!
